page.title: 10Industry in NE. Tiverton
page.content: At Craze Loman there is a small cottage industry making soft toys. This started off as a place of work where there was once a mill and has returned to a working factory. They make six types of furry animals which are dressed and undressed. In the factory there are nine workers and eighteen people work at home. The soft toys they make are sent to America,Japan,Australia,Canada and many other countries. Several are sent to outlets in the United Kingdom. One of the most popular soft toys is a Winnie the Pooh bear. The only other industry in the area is farming as the dairy at East Mere closed down some years ago.
